mapper.select: select count(*) from board where btmpsav=1 and bregdate is not null and ucode=#{ucode}
select count(*) from board where btmpsav=1 and bregdate is null and ucode=#{ucode}
select * from board where btmpsav=1 and bregdate is not null and ucode=#{ucode}
select * from board where btmpsav=1 and bregdate is null and ucode=#{ucode}
